_header: That one is light / That other is might
Subjects: Christ, gifts of; sermons, verse in
_description: Three gifts of Christ to man, in a Latin sermon — seven lines rhyming aaaabcb

CULKk424.Transcription:
þat oon ys lyȝth þat oþer ys
                    myȝthþe þrydde ys lyfe of ryȝthSyth lyȝth
                    & myȝth & lyfe of ryȝthto man y come ȝeuen
                    ysAlleluya may be owyr songeÞat ys a word of ioye &
                    blysse
